text: @IvankaTrump Especially the mothers who have lost children due to your dad's @realDonaldTrump lack of swift and decisive action in this pandemic. And pray for the strength of mothers who will soon lose children b/c of your dads lack of leadership w/COVID19, NRA,Alt right, the list goes on!
